page.title: 15DISTRICT NURSE/POLICEMAN
page.content: We interviewed two people who are part of our local community.Mrs.Bowen,the district nurse and health visitor,told us that in her job she cared for people from their birth until their death.She said that she had delivered over 400 babies.she visited them and their mothers to make sure they were both healthy.She told us that there were many old people living in the area because people lived much longer these days.She visited old people every day.P.C. Price told us the discipline of his job and we were surprised to learn that he could not even roll up his sleeves without permission from the chief constable.He showed us his radio,note book, handcuffs and his truncheon.He explained how and when he used them.It was his aim to get to know all the local children. {Talycopa}
